 公式测试
β′=(XTX)−1XTy=(∑xixiT)−1(∑xiyi)\beta^{\prime}=\left(X^{T} X\right)^{-1} X^{T} y=\left(\sum x_{i} x_{i}^{T}\right)^{-1}\left(\sum x_{i} y_{i}\right)
β′=(XTX)−1XTy=(∑xi​xiT​)−1(∑xi​yi​)
f(x,y)=(2πσ1σ21−ρ2)−1exp⁡[−12(1−ρ2)((x−μ1)2σ12−2ρ(x−μ1)(y−μ2)σ1σ2+(y−μ2)2σ22)]f(x, y)=\left(2 \pi \sigma_{1} \sigma_{2} \sqrt{1-\rho^{2}}\right)^{-1} \exp \left[-\frac{1}{2\left(1-\rho^{2}\right)}\left(\frac{\left(x-\mu_{1}\right)^{2}}{\sigma_{1}^{2}}-\frac{2 \rho\left(x-\mu_{1}\right)\left(y-\mu_{2}\right)}{\sigma_{1} \sigma_{2}}+\frac{\left(y-\mu_{2}\right)^{2}}{\sigma_{2}^{2}}\right)\right]
f(x,y)=(2πσ1​σ2​1−ρ2​)−1exp[−2(1−ρ2)1​(σ12​(x−μ1​)2​−σ1​σ2​2ρ(x−μ1​)(y−μ2​)​+σ22​(y−μ2​)2​)]

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
 Quick Start
 Create a new post
$ hexo new "My New Post"
More info: Writing
 Run server
$ hexo server
More info: Server
 Generate static files
$ hexo generate
More info: Generating
 Deploy to remote sites
$ hexo deploy
More info: Deployment
